Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters that relate to map areas.

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Exclude from the NT version or mark the ones to be excluded.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Exclude from the product version or mark the items to be excluded.

EnvMapCap00.Wiki: If the environmental map photography used for the morning time.

EnvMapCap01.Wiki: If the environmental map photography used for the day time.

EnvMapCap02.Wiki: If the environmental map photography used for the day time.

EnvMapCap03.Wiki: If the environmental map photography used for the evening time.

EnvMapCap04.Wiki: If the environmental map photography used for the night time.

EnvMapCap05.Wiki: If the environmental map photography used for the late night time.

EnvMapCap06.Wiki: If the environmental map photography used for the late night time.

SkydomeParam00.Wiki: The skybox dome row ID to use during the morning time.

SkydomeParam01.Wiki: The skybox dome row ID to use during the day time.

SkydomeParam02.Wiki: The skybox dome row ID to use during the day time.

SkydomeParam03.Wiki: The skybox dome row ID to use during the evening time.

SkydomeParam04.Wiki: The skybox dome row ID to use during the night time.

SkydomeParam05.Wiki: The skybox dome row ID to use during the late night time.

SkydomeParam06.Wiki: The skybox dome row ID to use during the late night time.
